content.title: Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana (Scholarship For Promotion Of Aptitude & Research In Stamps As A Hobby)
content.details: The Department of Posts, Ministry of Communications has launched a Scholarship Scheme called 'Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana' to award children in the class category of Standard 6th to 9th. It is proposed to award annual scholarships to students who have good academic records and are also pursuing 'Philately' as a hobby. The objective of the scholarship is to promote Philately among children at a young age in a sustainable manner that can reinforce and supplement the academic curriculum in addition to providing a hobby that can help them relax and de-stress.
benefits: The amount of the Scholarship is to be ₹ 6,000/- per annum @ ₹ 500/- per month.
Selections to the scholarship would be for one year.
An already selected student can apply for the scholarship next year provided he/she fulfills other criteria.
Every prospective school which participates in the competition would be assigned a Philately Mentor.
eligibility: The applicant should be a regular student of Class 6th-9th.
The applicant should be studying in a recognized school in India.
The school should have a Philately Club and the candidate should be a member of that Club.
The applicant should have scored at least 60% marks or equivalent grade/ grade point in the recent final examination.
There will be a 5% relaxation for SC/ST.
content.application_process: Offline. The applicant should download the Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana application form, fill in all mandatory fields, attach required documents, and send it through registered post or submit it in person to the concerned Regional Head / Divisional Head.
documents_required: Marksheets of the Previous Qualifying Examination
Philately Club's Membership or Account Details

faqs.question: How Are The Topics For The Philately Quiz Determined, And Who Provides The List Of Topics To The Participants?
faqs.answer: The topics for the Philately Quiz are determined by the Postal Circles, and they provide the list of topics to the participants when issuing notifications.

faqs.question: Who Evaluates The Project Work On Philately Submitted By The Candidates, And How Is It Conducted?
faqs.answer: The evaluation of the Project work on Philately is conducted by a committee at the circle level, consisting of Postal Officials and renowned Philatelists.

faqs.question: What Role Do Postal Officials And Renowned Philatelists Play In The Evaluation Process Of Philately Projects?
faqs.answer: Postal Officials and renowned Philatelists play a crucial role in assessing the quality and relevance of the Philately projects submitted by the candidates.

faqs.question: How Are The Awardees Selected For The Philately Quiz, And What Criteria Are Used For Making The Selection?
faqs.answer: Each Postal Circle selects the awardees based on their performance in the Philately Quiz and the evaluation of their Project work.

faqs.question: How Are Scholarships Disbursed To The Awardees, And What Is The Process Involved?
faqs.answer: After selecting the awardees, each Postal Circle provides the list of scholarship beneficiaries to IPPB/POSB, and the scholarships are disbursed to them on a quarterly basis.

faqs.question: Why Are The Awardees Asked To Open A Joint Account With Their Parents In India Post Payment Bank Or Post Office Savings Bank?
faqs.answer: The awardees are asked to open a Joint account with their parents in India Post Payment Bank or Post Office Savings Bank to ensure a secure and efficient disbursement of scholarships.

faqs.question: What Is The Purpose Of Assigning Philately Mentors To Prospective Schools Participating In The Competition?
faqs.answer: Philately Mentors are assigned to prospective schools to provide guidance and support in forming the School level Philately Club and help aspiring Philatelists pursue their hobby effectively.

faqs.question: What Roles Do Philately Mentors Play In The Formation Of The School Level Philately Club?
faqs.answer: Philately Mentors assist in forming the School level Philately Club and provide guidance to young and aspiring Philatelists in pursuing the hobby of Philately.

faqs.question: What Are The Educational Benefits Of Philately As A Hobby?
faqs.answer: Philately, as a hobby, offers educational benefits by providing insights into the socio-economic and political realities of the periods in which stamps were issued, enhancing memory skills, and fostering social connections with like-minded individuals.
